## ASidechain class

Abstract base class for sidechained subscription types (e.g. [sidechainPartition](./rstream.sidechainpartition.md)<!-- -->, [sidechainToggle](./rstream.sidechaintoggle.md)<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class ASidechain<A, S, B> extends Subscription<A, B> 
```
